PRUNSELLivingroom_sofaIntro-sharedassets: Dude your couch is like, really beaten up.
hey, its rude to judge a book by its cover.
i promise she's still got a spring in her step.
Yeah right, I'll be the judge of that.
PRUNSELLivingroom_TV-sharedassets6.asset: (Kris! We have got to borrow this TV at some point!)
Is that..@ all you use it for? News?
You don't watch any awesome action movies on it?!
funny you say that, one time i got a rental for a movie night.
surprisingly, it kept getting really "immersed" in the story.
it would take notes on the plot, warn the heros of danger, et cetera.
i gotta admit, it was pretty hilarious seeing it get so into it.
but after a while, it got kinda... dramatic, if ya catch my drift.
so, i slap a sticky note on the tv that says:
it started laughing at all injuries as if they were intentional goofs.
of course it didn't mean to look like a sociopath, i think.
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-0: Howdy! ;I'm <color=#FF00FF>Uprank</color>! ;<color=#FF00FF>Uprank</color>, the<color=red> God</color> of this world!
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-1: Don't act surprised, you know why you're here.
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-4: There are thousands of values you could edit.
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-8: You have tampered with the <color=red>ONE</color> thing you don't mess with.
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-9: With an infinite supply of cash, is it really gambling anymore?
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-11: You've might as well have removed gambling as a whole.
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-13: Don't let me catch you messing with gambling again, got it?
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-14: If there's one thing you take away from this..
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-15: In my world, it's <color=green>GAMBLE</color> or <color=green>BE GAMBLED</color>.#£
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-17: In my world, It's <color=green>GAMBLE</color> or <color=green>WORK REALLY HARD SO YOU CAN GAMBLE</color>. ~Got it?
Punishment-sharedassets41.assets-3-18: Now scram, I have to continue making a generous donation to my slot machine.
RouxlsRoom_AngryRouxls-sharedassets18.as: For just a second, you heard something.
RouxlsRoom_Intro-sharedassets18.assets-4: W-Wait, I don't remember creating this room...
RouxlsRoom_Pickaxe-sharedassets18.assets: Hmm, I wonder if Malius crafted this?
(The sudden urge to mine overwhelms you!)
RouxlsRoom_Pirate-sharedassets18.assets-: Oh, this is the pirate equipment Rouxls wore during our battle!
When the hell did you guys have a cool pirate battle?!
RouxlsRoom_PirateShip-sharedassets18.ass: Woah, this dude has a whole pirate ship?!
This is just a cardboard cutout!
RouxlsRoom_Rocks-sharedassets18.assets-5: (A large carving of brick and rock.)
(It appears quite a lot of work has went into its creation.)
Hey Ralsei, if it's taking this dude awhile to make a doorway...
... How did you make us entire rooms in under a day?
A mix of magic and perseverance, Susie.
RouxlsRoom_Sign-sharedassets18.assets-56: REMEMBERETH!!@ Thou can pusheth TWO blocks!!
RouxlsRoom_WarningSign-sharedassets18.as: Has Rouxls been digging into the walls?!
RudinnTrio_Battle_AttackDialogue_1-share: Long live the guy who pays us!
RudinnTrio_Battle_FlavorText_Intro-share: A necklace of Rudinns block your path.
RudinnTrio_Battle_FlavorText_Random_1-sh: Rudinn dislikes its boss, but doesn't care enough to quit.
RudinnTrio_Battle_FlavorText_Random_4-sh: Rudinn has no strong opinions one way or the other.

ShelterKeys_Drop-sharedassets33.assets-2: You sense that you may need to hold onto this.

ShelterKeys_Use-sharedassets33.assets-25: (You shake the keys on the keyring.)
SiplettTrio_Act_KrisCheers-sharedassets3: Cheers! ;To those you've helped so far!
SiplettTrio_Act_KrisCheers_X-sharedasset: Cheers! ;To friends we've made along the way!
SiplettTrio_Act_NoelleCheers-sharedasset: Cheers! ;To the wish that this fight will end soon!
SiplettTrio_Act_SusieCheers-sharedassets: Cheers! ;To all this free food lying around!
SiplettTrio_Battle_FlavorText_Default2-s: Siplett almost slips in a puddle of juice.
SiplettTrio_Battle_FlavorText_Intro-shar: A sudden wave of thirst washes over you.
Siplett_Check-sharedassets39.assets-420-: SIPLETT - AT 7 DF 2 ;A not so solo cup.
SupplyCloset_Bin-sharedassets23.assets-7: (The recycle bin is full of drawings.)
SupplyCloset_ForegroundItems-sharedasset: (One box is full of dusty fantasy books.)
(Another box is full of packing peanuts.)~(Not the tasty kind.)
SupplyCloset_Shelves-sharedassets23.asse: (Despite the urges, you accept that you'll need to return everything.)
(... Either that or be known as the town thief.)
SupplyCloset_SusieAwake-sharedassets23.a: Ugh... my head is killing me.
SupplyCloset_SusieLookAround-sharedasset: So this is what the supply closet actually looks like?
Gotta say, it's not quite as... grand as a whole kingdom.
SupplyCloset_Table-sharedassets23.assets: (The last open webpage is a tutorial on how to make DIY battle armour.)
(You bookmark the page and close the laptop.)
TS_BunkerEnding_EarlyTime-sharedassets36: (You were in there for quite a long time.)
(Despite the trouble you'll be in, you know it was worth while.)
TS_Finale-sharedassets34.assets-298-2: And... I don't know if I can handle it.
TS_Finale-sharedassets34.assets-298-3: I don't know if I'll ever be ready.
TS_IllBeWithYou-sharedassets34.assets-30: That would've made me really upset..
It's like when I used to go to my brother.
When things got hard... when I felt alone...
He always made time for me, even when his own world was falling apart.
... ;Sorry... I got a little carried away.
If it means saving everyone... I'll do it.
TS_ImportantProphecy-sharedassets34.asse: Susie's stronger than me... she can handle it.
Ralsei just wanted to include me...
So what if we're not there?
It's not like Mom or Dad would notice.
Counting down the days until their precious Asriel comes home.
The world... everything we care about...
It's all resting on me, isn't it?
Maybe that's what scares me the most.
TS_ImportantToMe-sharedassets34.assets-3: But... I think I needed to hear that.
All this time, I thought it was you making things better.
It felt like... someone else's life.
Will I ever get to be myself again?
I don't know if I believe that yet.
But maybe... I want to try.
TS_Kris-sharedassets34.assets-305-2: ... For the first time, I'm in control.
TS_Kris-sharedassets34.assets-305-3: And I'm going to stay here. ;It's not like anyone's waiting for me out there anyway.
TS_Kris-sharedassets34.assets-305-4: Why? ;Do you want me to leave so can I be your puppet again?!
TS_Kris-sharedassets34.assets-305-5: They like you more than me. ;...Always have.
TS_Kris-sharedassets34.assets-305-6: I'm not the one saving the world. ~I'm not anyone's hero.
TS_Kris2-sharedassets34.assets-306-0: Why would you care about me?
TS_Promise-sharedassets34.assets-308-2: I don't know where I'd be without you.
TS_Promise-sharedassets34.assets-308-3: But I'm ready now. ;Ready to leave.
TS_Promise-sharedassets34.assets-308-4: We've got a world to save, don't we?
TS_Promise-sharedassets34.assets-308-6: I trust you'll share that hope with everyone... just like you've shared it with me.
TS_Promise-sharedassets34.assets-308-7: For their safety... I'll try to stay out of your way.
TS_Promise-sharedassets34.assets-308-9: Don't forget to come visit me sometimes.
TS_Reason-sharedassets34.assets-309-1: What happens if we make the wrong choice?
TS_Reason-sharedassets34.assets-309-3: The world ending... it'll be our fault.
TS_Reason-sharedassets34.assets-309-4: And me? I'll have to spectate it all... powerless...
TS_Reason-sharedassets34.assets-309-5: Trapped in my own body, watching everything fall apart.
TS_ShelterLit_Bedding-sharedassets35.ass: (<color=#FF4428>Nath fillows</color>, neck pillows, and all sorts of comfy varieties.)
(Bath pillows, neck pillows, and all sorts of comfy varieties.)
(Shockingly, none of them are bed pillows.)
TS_ShelterLit_Corkboard-sharedassets35.a: (The corkboard displays instructions for rationing and emergency contacts.)

(At its center, a motivational poster proudly declares,
"Hang In There!")
TS_ShelterLit_JerryCans-sharedassets35.a: A pair of liquid containers, both named Jerry.
TS_ShelterLit_OpenTuna-sharedassets35.as: Half-eaten cans of tuna, with bite marks around the lids.
TS_ShelterLit_Shelves-sharedassets35.ass: Stacks of canned tuna, plenty of water bottles, and packs of batteries.
... Tucked away, a bottle of expired soda sits out of place. ~Its label is faded.
TS_ShelterLit_Table-sharedassets35.asset: (You hear a strange noise coming from the radio.)
(Unsurprisingly, a cockroach scuttles out from a hole in the radio.)
TS_WereHeroes-sharedassets34.assets-315-: They've been terrifying... overwhelming... but also...
I mean... we've already faced so much. Dark fountains, strange worlds...
and yet... the worst is probably still ahead.
And still, you believe in me.
If we're going to save the world, then I'll do my part.
